body:
Ensure the "Preview card on select" option is off in Settings->Deck Editor tab. Off is the default.

Open card explorer and move mouse over card entries so that new image is loaded each time. Click on the wizard icon in top left corner and check memory settings in About dialog. Repeat until free memory is around 30M which should take about two to three pages worth of cards.

Now open deck editor, load a prebuilt deck and view the tiled card view. F11 to toggle full screen mode. Boom...
